altTitles.ja: ブトゥーム

description.en:
Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---
description.ru:
Сакамото Рёта — 22-летний безработный, игрок мирового уровня в популярную командную боевку «Btooom!». То, что он при этом сидит на шее у матери, парня не волнует, мыслями он всецело в виртуальном мире, где крут, беспощаден и неотразим. Только в наше время до виртуальной реальности далеко — в этом Рёта убедился на своей шкуре, очнувшись в джунглях, крепко избитый, с чужой сумкой и полным сумбуром в голове. В общем, вышло так, что чья-то злая воля закинула на необитаемый остров несколько десятков игроков и предложила им сразиться в «Btooom!» вживую и по-крупному. Без оружия, без доспехов — только ручные бомбы, собственные тела и гражданская одежда. Как говорится — естественный отбор!  
  
Но истинного игрока королевской битвой смутить сложно, особенно когда на кону собственная жизнь. Так что вскоре Рёта отбросил интеллигентские сопли и приготовился, как не столь далекие предки, жить по принципу «или ты, или тебя». Главное — выжить, а там уже можно пофилософствовать о смысле бытия и вдоволь поспорить с сердечной подругой Химико — за что им досталась такая участь? Как говорят: не согрешишь — не покаешься, не покаешься — не спасешься. А еще на острове можно повидать новые места, насладиться прекрасной природой, встретить много интересных людей… и убить их!  
  


---

  
**Links:**

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/JokeRJUN)

altTitles.ja: MFゴースト

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

altTitles.ja: 罪と快

description.en:
Under immense pressure to achieve academically both at school and at home, Minedera Zen turns to taking upskirt photos of girls as a form of escape from his life. One day, while doing his usual rounds, Zen is caught by the subject of his upskirt at the time, Houjou Ayame…

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [FAKKU](<https://www.fakku.net/hentai/pleasure-corruption-english>)

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)

![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: シェパードハウス・ホテル

altTitles.vi: Khách sạn dẫn lối linh hồn

description.en:
In Alberta, Canada, there is a hotel located on the shores of a lake. The hotel, which was the scene of a horrific incident in the past and is surrounded by disturbing rumors, has become a special place that helps souls of the dead move on and finally rest (checkout).

This hotel is called “Shepherd House”. A house of rest that brings healthy relaxation to all souls. And today, another new guest arrives…

---
**Notes:**
- [On hiatus](https://x.com/morikazukisan/status/1786747915152892002)

title.en: Roro-chan wa Kahogo na Kyodai Musume

altTitles.ja: ローロちゃんは過保護な巨大娘

description.en: Paolo, a hunter who makes a living hunting monsters, sets forth into unknown lands to capture a legendary Divine Dragon... but when losing his grip while climbing a deep valley, he loses consciousness.And when he comes to, he finds himself in a bath with a legendary dragon! And she's adorable!Now kept against his will as a giant dragon girl's pet, the initially hostile boy tries to escape, but... when he sees how earnestly this giant girl takes care of her pet (him), his feelings begin to waver. Should he run, or let her keep him?A gentle giant girl and a tiny hero's fluffy, heartwarming... pet-raising comedy!?

title.en: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なＪＫの話

altTitles.en: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length
Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.zh: 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK

altTitles.id: Kisah Antara Komite Lugu dan Gadis SMA dengan Rok yang Terlalu Pendek

altTitles.pt-br: A História Entre um Monitor Burro e uma Colegial com a Saia em um Cumprimento Inadequado

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cậu ủy viên ngốc nghếch và cô bạn gái có độ dài váy quá ngắn

description.en: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
description.ja: 度が過ぎるほど“マジメ”な風紀委員・桜大門くんの日々の役目は、校門当番として生徒たちの服装をチェックすること。彼がいつも注意するのは、髪の毛が明るくミニスカートな“問題児”小日向さん。口うるさい桜大門くんを嫌がる彼女だったが、彼が実はかなりの“ポンコツ”であることを知ってしまい…！？
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

altTitles.it: Fujiwara-kun ha ragione, piu' o meno

altTitles.en: Fujiwara-kun is right, more or less

altTitles.ja: 藤原くんはだいたい正しい

altTitles.zh: 藤原同学说的大抵都对

altTitles.pt-br: Fujiwara-kun tem razão, mais ou menos

description.en:
The heroine Hitsuji is nicknamed "Kigurumi-chan" by her surroundings. While she is friendly with everyone thanks to her easygoing personality, she is distressed about not being treated as a girl. She's always had an unrequited love for her classmate Touya, who always quarrels with her.   
  
One day, the number one popular boy in the school and the student council president Fujiwara-kun suddenly gives her the new nickname "Mojako"…
description.pt-br: A protagonista Hitsuji, tem o apelido de "Kigurumi-chan" pelas pessoas á sua volta. Por ser amiga de todo mundo graças a sua personalidade fácil e simpática, ela se preocupa com o fato de não ser tratada como uma garota (e Hitsuji tem uma quedinha por Toyua, o garoto que sempre briga com ela). Um dia o garoto mais popular da escola e o presidente do conselho estudantil Fujiwara-kun, de repente lhe dá o apelido de "Mojako".

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: けいおん！Shuffle
けいおん！シャッフル

description.en: Sakuma Yukari decided to start a band on her own after seeing a certain band during the Sakura High School festival, then with her best friend Shimizu Kaede, they want to join the Light Music Club only to discover that in their school there isn't a club like that. With help from Sawabe Maho, they discover there is a Light Music Appreciation Society with only one member, Satou Riko.
description.pt-br: Sakuma Yukari decidiu começar uma banda sozinha depois de ver uma certa banda durante o festival Sakura High School, então com sua melhor amiga Shimizu Kaede, eles querem se juntar ao Clube De Músicas Leves apenas para descobrir que em sua escola não há um clube assim. Com a ajuda de Sawabe Maho, eles descobrem que existe uma Sociedade de Apreciação de Música Leve com apenas um membro, Satou Riko.

altTitles.en: Till We Meet Again, My King

altTitles.ja: さよならまたね、僕の王1

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

altTitles.ja: 九龍城でもう一度

description.en: Kowloon Walled City: A lawless slum packed to the brim with high-rise buildings. In this confined city where various races and families live crowded together like sardines, Ryouma works as a landlord. But one day, he meets Méi Zhī, a spirit who had been inhabiting a tea pot...

title.en: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator

altTitles.vi: Trọng SInh Đô Thị Tu Tiên

description.en: Chen Fan died in the midst of divine tribulation, having reached the pinnacle of the cultivation world in less than 500 years. Somehow, despite the loss of his cultivation base, he was able to return to his youth as a high school student living on Earth. He decided to once again tread the path to immortality, armed with the knowledge he had gathered in his past life, to overwrite his past mistakes, remove his lingering regrets, and set a firm spiritual foundation that will guarantee success in his inevitable attempt to once again ascend to another plane of existence.
description.pt: Chen Fan morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.
description.vi: Truyện Trọng Sinh Đô Thị Tu Tiên được chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết cùng tên của tác giả Thập Lý Kiếm Thần Bắc Huyền Tiên Tôn Trần Phàm do tu hành quá nhanh mà độ kiếp thất bại. Trở về thời niên thiếu ở trái đất, pháp bảo, thần thông, tiên khí đều không còn. Hắn nhớ lại ân oán tình thù ngày trước, quyết tâm đền bù đầy đủ, tu hành một thế, trúc vô thượng đạo cơ, rũ sạch tâm ma... thành tựu Chân Tiên đại đạo
description.pt-br: Chen Fanyu morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

altTitles.en: Touhou dj - Patchouli Is So Precocious
パチュリーってばおまーせさん!

description.en: A moe 4koma about none other than Patchouli.

title.en: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~

altTitles.ja: 異世界召喚おじさんの銃無双ライフ 〜サバゲー好きサラリーマンは会社終わりに異世界へ直帰する〜

altTitles.ru: Призванный в потусторонний мир дядя - живёт оружейным воином

altTitles.en: The Gunner's Life of a Middle-aged Man Summoned to Another World and Armed with a Rifle: An Airsoft Addicted Salaryman Returns to the Alternative World After Work

altTitles.id: Om-Om Pegawai Kantoran Pecinta Airsoft Pergi Ke Dunia Lain

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống "thiện xạ" của ông chú được triệu hồi sang dị giới

description.en: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
description.id: Seorang om-om yang hobi bermain airsoft bernama koga daisuke telah terpanggil ke dunai lain pada ulang tahunnya yang ke-40. Dianugerahi sebuah kekuatan untuk mengubah senjata airsoft menjadi senjata asli, daisuke harus bisa menyelamatkan dunia tersebut selagi bolak-balik dari dunia lain ke dunia nyata. bersama dengan seorang ksatria bernama lena, daisuke menjadi satu-satunya pengguna senapan yang akan mendominasi dunia lain tersebut sepulang kerja!
description.ja: サバゲー好きのサラリーマン・古賀大介は、40歳の誕生日を迎えた日に異世界に召喚された。現実と異世界を行き来しながら、異世界を救うことになった大介に与えられたのは、「エアガンを本物の銃に変化させる能力」。異世界で出会った女性剣士・レナと共に、大介は唯一の銃使いとして会社終わりに異世界で無双する!!

altTitles.ja: 黄金の経験値

description.en:
The conquest story of the final boss protagonist begins here!

"Boot Hour, Shoot Curse" is a VRMMORPG that has no concept of levels or professions. Instead, players must farm experience points to gain new skills and increase their status.
Rare, a girl who participated in the closed beta test, has acquired the hidden skill "Subordinate", which allows her to turn NPCs into her subordinates. The skill also transfers the experience points gained by the subordinates to Rare.

She used the skill to gradually add new NPCs she encountered to her party. As a result of the unprecedented amount of experience gained from her minions, she was able to evolve into a Demon Lord.
___
[Light Novel (EN)](https://j-novel.club/series/exp-is-golden)
description.fr:
L’histoire de la conquête du boss final commence ici !

« Boot Hour, Shoot Curse » est un VRMMORPG qui n’a ni de concept de niveaux ni de métiers. Au lieu de cela, les joueurs doivent accumuler des points d’expérience pour acquérir de nouvelles compétences et améliorer leur statut et leur personnage.
Rare, une jeune fille qui a participé aux tests de la version bêta fermée, a acquis la compétence cachée « Subordonné », qui lui permet de transformer des PNJ en ses subordonnés. Cette compétence transfère également les points d’expérience gagnés par les subordonnés à Rare.
Elle a utilisé cette compétence pour ajouter progressivement à son groupe de nouveaux PNJ qu’elle rencontrait. Et grâce à la quantité d’expérience accumulée par ses subordonnés, elle a pu devenir un Roi Démon
description.ja: 新作VRMMORPG『Boot hour, shoot curse』のオープンβテストに参加した主人公レアが手に入れたのは、隠しスキル『使役』。ゲームならよくある【レベル】や【ジョブ】というシステムが存在しない代わりに、獲得した【経験値】を使ってスキルを取得したり、ステータスを上昇させたりするこのゲームにおいて、「眷属化したキャラの獲得経験値をすべて自分に集約する」という『使役』はとんでもないスキルだった。レアは、『使役』を使って出会ったNPCや魔物を次々眷属化。増え続ける【経験値】で自身と配下を強化し続けた結果、いつの間にか「特定災害生物『魔王』」の判定を受けてしまい…!?
description.ru:
«Время загрузки, выпущенное проклятие» — это VRMMORPG, в которой нет понятия уровней и профессий. Вместо этого игроки должны накапливать очки опыта, чтобы получать новые навыки и повышать свой статус.
Рэйра, девушка, участвовавшая в закрытом бета-тестировании, приобрела скрытый навык «Подчинённый», который позволяет ей превращать NPC в своих подчинённых. Навык также передаёт очки опыта, полученные подчинёнными, Рэйре.
Она использовала этот навык, чтобы постепенно добавлять в свою команду новых NPC, с которыми встречалась. В результате беспрецедентного количества опыта, полученного от приспешников, она смогла эволюционировать в Лорда демонов.

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

altTitles.ja: メイドの岸さん

description.en: Kiichiro Hayase has a reputation as the wealthiest, hottest, most eligible bachelor in town. But as they say...behind every successful man is the maid who keeps him from tripping over his own two feet! Enter Miss Kishi, the most competent, professional maid around—and the only thing keeping from Kiichiro quite literally crashing and burning. He owes it all to her, but can he ever make it up to her? He's sworn to try... no matter how many things must get broken, scattered, or lost to do so!
description.pt: Uma comédia romântica sobre um mestre desajeitado que quer fazer sua calma empregada feliz. Hayase Kiichirou vem de uma importante família. Como próximo sucessor, todas as empresas da família serão dele. Ele é a elite da elite. Contudo, sua única fraqueza é o fato de ser desajeitado, assim, Kishi-san, sua empregada, é aquela que sempre da um jeito nas coisas pra ele. Apesar de ter sempre a mesma expressão, Kiichirou está determinado a fazê-la feliz, independente da situação.
description.vi: Kiichiro Hayase là một đại gia giàu nứt đổ đổ vách, cùng với vẻ ngoài điển trai, nói không ngoa thì anh chính là nam thần hàng đầu Nhật Bản. Tuy nhiên như bao người đàn ông ở ngoài kia, Kiichiro của chúng ta cũng có vô số thiếu sót, khiến anh phải dựa vào cô hầu gái riêng của mình là Kishi để giữ vững hình tượng "hoàn hảo" kia.

altTitles.ja: コハエースこれくしょん
コハこれ

description.en:
We're ready to activate Super Dogeza toward basically everybody!

A collection of works by the popular manga artist of Koha-Ace, Keikenchi, has finally arrived. Included in this volume are the ultra-rare collaborations with Prisma Illya, Kantai Collection and Lucky☆Star! It's a volume that's sure to get you hooked on the world of Keikenchi! (Koha-Ace side-story collection, released between Koha-Ace EX and Koha-Ace XP)

altTitles.ja: 児玉まりあ文学集成

description.en:
Follow the unique and intense activities of the literature club, consisting of the flawless Kodama-san, the president as well as its only member, and Fueda-kun, the promising applicant.  
  
Was nominated for the 24th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

This series is adapted from a novel on the zhulang site. 

Lin Qinghan’s grandfather (her father’s father) is facing an imminent danger. His relatives disregarded the stability of Lin conglomerate and used various despicable means to inherit properties owned by him. President Qinghan was framed in the process. However, her husband, Zhang Xuan, who owns the title of “Satan” among the Lords of Dragon King Temple, is resolving everything one by one.

title.en: Arknights: Want to Make a Movie?

altTitles.zh: 暮岁闲谈: 来拍电影吗

description.en: This is something more direct than memory.

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—

title.en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island with Four Beautiful Girls

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.vi: Ta Muốn Trở Thành Chúa Tể Bóng Tối!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

title.en: Gomi Ika da to Tsuihousareta Shounin, Jitsu wa Zensei Kenja Desu ~Shijou Saikyou no Kenja, Sekai Saikou Hou no Gakuen ni Kayou~

altTitles.ja: ゴミ以下だと追放された使用人、実は前世賢者です　～史上最強の賢者、世界最高峰の学園に通う～

altTitles.en: The Servant Who Was Banished for Being Less Than Trash Is Actually a Sage in a Previous Life: The Most Powerful Sage in History Attends the World's Most Prestigious Academy

description.en:
One day, Gard, a servant of a count's family, was framed for a crime he did not commit and was fired from his job.

"You're worse than trash! Get out of this house immediately!"

Expelled from the Count's family and with nowhere to go, Gard saw a flyer recruiting students for Remillion Magic Academy and decided to take the entrance exam in the royal capital. It was said to be the most difficult exam to enter a magic academy, but Gard passed it with ease. How could this happen to Gard, who was just a servant?! Yes, in his previous life, Gard was actually the "strongest sage"! The strongest sage is unrivaled!
description.ja: ある日、伯爵家の使用人だったガルドは、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、「お前はゴミ以下だ！ すぐに家から出ていけ！」と、使用人を解雇されてしまう。伯爵家から追放され、行く当てのないガルドは、レミリオン魔法学園の生徒募集チラシを目にし、王都で入学試験を受けることに。最難関と言われる魔法学園の試験だったが、ガルドはその試験を次々にパスしてしまう。なぜ、単なる使用人だったガルドに、そんなことが！？　そう、ガルドの前世は、なんと“最強の賢者”だったのだ！最強賢者が無双する！

altTitles.ja: 動物のお医者さん
新装版　動物のお医者さん

description.en: The humorous adventures of a veterinary student, his friends, and his dog, as they learn how to care for all kinds of animals.

title.en: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen

altTitles.ja: 現代社会で乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢をするのはちょっと大変

altTitles.ja-ro: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou o Suru no wa Chotto Taihen

altTitles.en: Modern Villainess: It’s Not Easy Building A Corporate Empire Before The Crash

altTitles.id: Tidak mudah membangun kerajaan perusahaan sebelum runtuh

description.en: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.
description.id:
Saya bereinkarnasi sebagai putri jahat dalam game otome berdasarkan dunia modern.

Tetapi karena ini adalah dunia modern, kehidupan lambat seorang penjahat memiliki banyak kesulitan, dan sejarah Jepang modern, sejarah ekonomi modern, dan ekonomi global menyerang karakter utama saat dia mencoba mengatur urusan rumah tangga.

Bertahanlah, penjahat! Jangan kalah, penjahat!

Ini adalah kisah tentang perjuangan Keikain Runa, seorang putri jahat yang melemparkan dirinya ke dalam pemalsuan sejarah dan perang uang, meninggalkan karakter utama dan target penangkapan untuk menjalani kehidupan yang lambat, dengan latar belakang Perang Dunia yang hilang , runtuhnya gelembung ekonomi, dan krisis keuangan yang mengancam.
description.ja:
バブル崩壊以降長く続く不況に沈む日本――。厳しい時代の中で不遇に喘ぐ女性が、失意のうちに命を落とした。しかし彼女の運命はそこで終わらず、目を覚ますと“現代”を舞台にした乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢・桂華院瑠奈に転生を果たす！時はバブル崩壊直後、転生からほどなくして生家が危機に瀕するも、前世の知識を駆使して平成の一大特需“ITバブル”に乗ることに成功。莫大な利益を手にした瑠奈は、破滅の運命を回避――したはずだった･･･。

「これは、私達が時代に行う復讐の物語よ」

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

altTitles.ja: 無限の魔法使い

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の兄に転生しました

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--
description.id:
"Abwang?"

Cain, orang yang baru saja bereinkarnasi menjadi salah satu target kencan di sebuah otome game, tiba-tiba berteriak karena melihat keimutan adik perempuannya, Diana.
Aku tidak menyangka kalau malaikat kecil ini akan menjadi seorang villainess dengan akhir yang tragis-- Tidak, aku tidak akan membiarkan masa depan seperti itu terjadi!
Dengan mengepalkan tangannya, dia bertekat untuk membesarkan adik perempuannya menjadi seorang wanita yang baik hati dan tidak sombong, sembari menghilangkan segala masa lalu yang buruk dari para target kencan lain menggantikan sang tokoh utama.
Bergantung pada pengetahuannya tentang gamenya di kehidupan yang dulu dan juga pengalamannya sebagai anak yatim piastu, semuanya dilakukan demi adik perempuannya-- dan akhirnya, tantangan bagi sang kakak akan dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: ゲーム実況中に過労死し、乙女ゲームのキャラ・カインに転生した俺は、妹・ディア―ナの圧倒的可愛さに心を奪われた。しかし、このままゲーム世界が進んでいけば、妹は辺境の地で凌辱されたり、暗殺者に殺される壮絶なバットエンドを迎えると決まっていた。「この世界で妹を幸せにする!!」そう誓った俺は妹を淑女に育てながら、ゲームのシナリオに逆らっていく。そう、すべては愛する妹のため……。「おにーたま、ディ、にんじんもたべたのです!」「えらい! ディアーナは何て素晴らしいんだ!!!」

altTitles.ja: 廻天のアルバス

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.ja: 魔王を倒した。世界は平和に。でも、間に合わなかった。なぜかこの冒険を繰り返している勇者アルバスは、急ぎたい。これは世界を救う物語であり、そして――
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

title.en: Musket Girls! ~Tensei Sanbou to Senretsu Otome-tachi~

altTitles.en: Musket Girls! Reincarnated Staff Officer and Battle Line Maidens

altTitles.ja: マスケットガールズ！～転生参謀と戦列乙女たち～

description.en: After my previous life was cut short, I was reincarnated in a world of early modern-style warfare where line infantry exchanges gunfire. Being a commoner second lieutenant, I was shunned as "Krombertz the Grim Reaper" because of the many deaths of my men in battle. With that, I was assigned to the 6th Special Duty Brigade, an all-female unit, as a staff officer. The brigade commander, who is up to something, and the carefree non-commissioned officers are women, while the foot soldiers are just girls who are practically amateurs. In this world, if you don't fight, you will be killed. That being the case, I have to do something about this... but how?!

altTitles.ja: ベイブレード
爆転SHOOTベイブレード
爆転シュート ベイブレード
爆転シュートベイブレード

description.en:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media 
  
The following link is to AnimeNewsNetwork for all of the various manga, anime adaptions, sequels, and spinoffs:  
[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

altTitles.ja: 無敵の人

description.en: It is said that there is no such thing as an "undefeated" player in mahjong due to the large element of luck. However, an undefeated player suddenly appears on Japan's largest online mahjong site, Jansen! His name is "M," and in order to find out if M is cheating, Sonokawa Junpei, a poor part-time worker, approaches him under the guise of a fake friendship. However, when he discovers the secret of M's strength, he begins to develop a passionate friendship with him... The tale of mahjong friendship that challenges the wall of undefeatedness begins!

altTitles.ja: 魔法のつかいかた

description.en: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: 王様ランキング

description.en:
The web manga centers around Bojji, a deaf, powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son, he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However, people mutter about him behind his back as "a good-for-nothing prince" and "no way he can be king."  
  
Bojji is able to make his first ever friend, "Kage" — a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming-of-age as he meets various people in his life, starting with his fateful encounter with Kage.
description.es:
Bojji es un príncipe sordomudo que vive en un mundo fantástico repleto de criaturas mágicas. Pese a no destacar en nada, y siendo incapaz ni siquiera de empuñar una espadita de niño, sueña con algún día convertirse en el rey más grande del mundo.

La gente lo considera un completo inútil y sin ningún talento para ser rey. Aunque la situación cambia cuando conoce a Kage, una sombra (literalmente) que es uno de los pocos supervivientes de un clan de asesinos y que intenta robarle las pocas pertenencias que Bojji llevaba encima.

De alguna manera, Kage logra comprender al príncipe y se convierte en su primer amigo verdadero, dando así inicio a la aventura que Bojji tanto anhela. Mientras tanto, en la oscuridad, un poder amenaza con devastar al reino.
description.ru: Боддзи удаётся найти своего первого в жизни друга, «Кагэ» — буквально тень на земле, которая каким-то образом хорошо понимает Боддзи. История рассказывает о взрослении Боддзи, о том, как он встречает разных людей в своей жизни, начиная с судьбоносной встречи с Кагэ.
description.vi:
"Bảng xếp hạng Quốc vương" xoay quanh Bojji, một hoàng tử điếc, vô năng, và thậm chí không thể cầm nổi thanh kiếm của một đứa con nít. Là con cả, cậu luôn cố gắng hết mình để tiến tới ước mơ trở thành vị vua vĩ đại nhất thế giới. Thế nhưng, luôn có những kẻ buông lời xì xào bàn tán sau lưng Bojji, bảo cậu là "một thằng hoàng tử bất tài", và "không đời nào có thể trở thành vua được". 

Bojji đã có người bạn đầu tiên của mình, "Kage", một bóng đen trên mặt đất, bằng cách nào đó lại có thể hiểu rõ về cậu. Đây là câu chuyện kể về sự trưởng thành của Bojji khi cậu gặp được những người khác nhau trong cuộc đời mình, bắt đầu từ lần gặp gỡ định mệnh của cậu với Kage.
description.pt-br:
O mangá da web comic gira em torno de Bojji, um príncipe surdo e impotente que não consegue nem empunhar uma espada infantil. Como filho primogênito, ele se esforça muito e sonha em se tornar o maior rei do mundo. No entanto, as pessoas murmuram sobre ele pelas costas como 'um príncipe inútil' e 'de jeito nenhum ele pode ser rei'.

Bojji é capaz de fazer seu primeiro amigo, 'Kage' - literalmente um ser vivo que é uma sombra no chão que de alguma forma entende Bojji bem. A história segue o amadurecimento de Bojji enquanto ele conhece várias pessoas em sua vida, começando com seu fatídico encontro com Kage.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 12, Cap 155. ]

description.en: 500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.

altTitles.ja: 死にたくなければ

description.en:
Im Dajun is a high school student who gets bullied at school every day. He came across an interview on TV just when he was on the verge of giving up on life. It was with a murderer who killed the classmates that bullied him. Dajun becomes inspired by what he saw and decides to take revenge as well.

His revenge was successful. However, his life steered into an undesired direction. Im Dajun, leaving school, ends up joining a strange Runaway Fam.

The young runaway, Im Dajun, no longer suffers from the bullies at his school. Instead, he now must survive against even more vicious thugs on the streets.

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/to-not-die/list?title_no=2978)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jietoushegncunshouce/list?title_no=1720)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)
description.ja:
これは生存を賭けた命がけの闘い！

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/to-not-die/list?title_no=2978)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jietoushegncunshouce/list?title_no=1720)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)
description.ko:
고등학생 임다준은 학교에서 늘상 괴롭힘을 당하는 게 일상이었다. 삶을 포기하기 직전 우연히 본 티비 속 동급생 살해범의 인터뷰에 감명을 받고 복수를 결심하게 된다.
복수는 성공했지만 삶은 원치않는 방향으로 흘러가게 되고.. 학교에서 나온 임다준은 범상치않은 가출팸에 들어가게 된다.
가출청소년 임다준은 더이상 학교 안 일진들에게 시달리지 않게 되었지만 그보다 잔혹한 길거리의 양아치들을 상대로 살아남아야만 한다.

삶의 끝자락에 내몰린 고등학생 임다준의 길거리 생존기!

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/to-not-die/list?title_no=2978)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jietoushegncunshouce/list?title_no=1720)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)
description.zh:
懦弱少年复仇后无家可归，
残酷的街头生存挑战开始！
男主任多骏经常被欺负。在他想要寻短见的那一刻，偶然看到电视里的一段采访，感触颇深，决定报仇。而后虽然复仇成功，但他的人生却也朝着无法预测的方向发展。被父亲赶出家门的他开始街头流浪，必须要面对更残酷的街头混混生活。被逼上绝路的他能否生存下来呢？

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/to-not-die/list?title_no=2978)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jietoushegncunshouce/list?title_no=1720)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)
description.pt-br: Um estudante do ensino médio, Im Da-Joon está acostumado a ser intimidado na escola. Pouco antes de acabar com a própria vida, ele viu por acaso a entrevista de um amigo assassino na TV. Ele ficou impressionado com a entrevista e decidiu se vingar. Sua vingança foi bem-sucedida, mas sua vida foi na direção errada… Im Da-Joon abandonou a escola e se juntou ao grupo de adolescentes que fugiram de suas casas. Da-Joon agora está livre dos valentões da escola, mas agora ele tem que sobreviver contra as gangues de rua que são muito mais duras do que os valentões da escola.
description.zh-hk:
高中生林多俊每天在學校遭受以李道允為首的不良學生們的霸凌，在他想結束自己的生命以解脫的前一晚，偶然在電視上看到殺害多名霸凌者的高中生的訪問，而萌生報仇的念頭。某次又受到李道允的霸凌時，他將道允推向衝來的貨車。在看似成功的復仇之後，席捲而來的是....？

---

**Links:**

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jietoushegncunshouce/list?title_no=1720)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)

title.en: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!

altTitles.en: Technique Is Everything to Yumizuka Iroha!
The Process Is Important for Iroha Yumizuka
Yumizuka Iroha's No Good Without Her Procedure!

altTitles.ja: 弓塚いろはは手順が大事！

altTitles.zh: 弓塚同学今天也依旧脱靶

description.en: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!
